title: Covid-19 Cluster: 100 tested positive
content: 100 persons tested positive for Covid-19, confirmed the Department of Government Information.Among them, 84 are associates of Peliyagoda Covid-19 Cluster and 16 are prisoners. The total of 100 cases reported today (05) so far.The total number of confirmed cases rises to 88 647 from Covid-19 Clusters.
